website_summaries.verdict: Solid and inexpensive, these stainless steel bowls also come with lids, making them very useful kitchen tools.
pros: Extra-wide lip on the bowls makes gripping a little easier
Lids create an airtight seal with an extra push in the middle, making them great take on the go bowls
cons: Lids can be a little tricky to seal and have a tendency to warp in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: These are darn good bowls
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes them. The three year old likes them. The middle size bowl is his new favorite hat. But I'm the one who cooks in them. I like that they're sturdy with no sharp edges. They look really clean after I use and wash them. Some bowls just never get really clean looking. Maybe those ones are made from cheaper metal. These bowls are substantial enough to stay put even when I have to use some force to crush tomatoes or mix thick batters. Darn good bowls. All the caps fit well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon In TX

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality, so back it went for a refund
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited about this order, until I opened the box and set them on the counter top. That's when I noticed the middle bowl was warped on the bottom and would not sit flat. I could also press on the bottom the bowl and hear and feel the metal popping in and out. Not great quality, so back it went for a refund. Dissapointing! If I could be assured that this was a fluke, I might consider re-ordering. I really liked the non-slip bottom, and the measure marks on the inside of the bowls. Nice features, poor quality. Keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Probably Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These bowels solve every mixing and storage problem I can imagine. The right sizes with a lid. Time will be the test.
customer_reviews.author: james mantell

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to Like but the rust and lid issues killed it
customer_reviews.text: With all of the good reviews, I wanted to like these bowls. I washed them in the dishwasher and rust color water came from somewhere (maybe under the lip?) Then I realized that the lid for the medium bowl does not seal. Just sits there without sealing. It's almost as if the lid is made too small.
customer_reviews.author: Oui No

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Functional
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are a beautiful addition to my kitchen. They look very nice and are nice to use as serving bowls for parties, or mixing bowls for cooking and baking events with family and friends. The rubber bottoms and air-tight seals also make them very functional for preventing slips and spills, and keeping food fresh in the fridge. Thanks for a great product. I highly recommend these to anyone who spends time in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: PKoStyle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Rust marks appeared after the second time use! Also, need to put a lot of pressure to close the lid
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting steel bowls with lids for several years, but never before found any that seemed exactly right. I really like these, the sizes are great, and the non-slip bottoms are a plus. The company also sent a cute email when the bowls were shipped, saying they would be checking their computers every 30 seconds, "like geeky teenagers in love", until they knew that I was happy with the bowls. You can stop checking now, Fitzroy and Fox, I think they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: carole

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these regularly for marinating meats & prepping meals for the past few months and could not be happier with them! The lids are air tight, and the bowls are sturdy and can be placed in the dishwasher. I love that you can place the lids on and shake the bowls to evenly distribute seasonings, dressings, and/or marinades. The lids are also nice when placing prepped vegetables/leftovers in the fridge. While I also have other mixing/prep bowls without lids that are plastic, I always reach for these first!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great idea but terrible when you get them in person. I was really frustrated because they had such great reviews but the tops of the ones that I got don't even close all the way. I tried to make it work but couldn't get it to fit on the bowl which really stink cuz they are advertised as being leak proof. Obviously they aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: There are mixing bowls and then there are the Fitzroy and Fox Non Slip Bowls........
customer_reviews.text: WOW, these are nice bowls. Nice and thick bowl walls give these a feeling of quality, which they definitely are. My wife LOVES how the bowls won't slide on the counter top due to the surface on the bottom of the bowl. The lids fit well, yet are not difficult to remove. These bowls are one of those rare purchases where you find yourself EXTREMELY PLEASED with the product you received and you are glad that the company who makes and sells these is paying attention to their market and customers. I simply can't imagine why someone wouldn't like these...... Very well done......
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Aungst

customer_reviews.title: The bowl itself is great if you don’t want to use it as a container with lid
customer_reviews.text: The metal bowl parts are great, they’re sturdy and heavy, it’s very good quality. But unfortunately the lids somehow got smaller after a few uses, and they don’t fit enough tightly now. I wish they’re were airtight like they first were because that’s how it kept my salad fresh for days but not anymore. I could just put a plate on it, there would be no difference. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls and Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I've ordered over the years (our first set is still in good condition). My family use these for mixing and storing almost everything because of the various sizing and practically airtight. Great purchase and love, love, love these bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bowls
customer_reviews.text: This is really a 4 1/2 star review. These bowls easy to use, have nice grippy rubber bottoms, easy to store nested in the cupboard, have quantity markings in the inside for easy measuring, and they’re easy to clean. There is one minor complaint...when you put a bowl with a lid in the fridge, due to the cool temp, the lid contracts just little and doesn’t fit as snugly on the bowl as it should. Overall, these bowls are a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: David Y

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mixing bowls

I know they are just mixing bowls but if you love to bake or cook. These will definitely do the job!!
customer_reviews.author: Major Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, they are mixing bowls... but they are beautiful! The lids snap on VERY tight, which will be very nice for keeping any liquids (ice cream base) cold in the fridge until ready to use. They nest nicely, saving cabinet space. The non-slip bottom is great. I enjoy cooking and it is so nice to have nicer tools in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: azbeachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bowls
customer_reviews.text: The mixing bowls are beautiful. I got the red ones to match with my kitchen. I like the non-slip bottom, wide edge to hold on while mixing, and how deep they are. I didn't try to use a mixer yet but I think the bowls will get scratched inside. Well, isn't that their fate after all? It is easy to attach and remove the lids. I couldn't find bowls with lids anywhere but on Amazon. I plan to marinate meats in these bowls. I appreciate the fact that the lids are BPA free. I got rid of my old plastic bowls because I wanted something safer.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!!!

Used the medium bowl to make brownies, didn't scratch the bowl at all and bowl stayed put in the counter while mixing.

customer_reviews.title: Great for every day, heavy duty

customer_reviews.title: perfect!

I was hesitant to go to steel because I thought it would look and feel cheap. These bowls do neither of those things. I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keighlar

Apparently this is normal of all mixing bowls. These bowls were the first mixing bowls I have used or owned so I was disappointed at first to see the scratches. However, these bowls are amazing. The grip hasn’t worn after months of use. The lids still fit properly and makes it convenient to take foods to parties. I love these bowls
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: They are OK, but nothing to write home about.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these

I'm very happy with these bowls.

customer_reviews.author: Mona Manquero

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe!

customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls use them on a daily. Perfect to take salads or other dishes places

customer_reviews.title: Smart Buy

customer_reviews.title: A Much Appreciated Gift!

I really liked how they were stackable and they won't take up much space in his small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: SJEverhart

customer_reviews.title: Practical and a good buy!

I wish it had a brushed metal finish inside so I could not worry about that. But otherwise -- great, light weight, non-skid, pretty blue, useful lids. A very good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Bowl Set
